评论详情: The GRACE KARIN Women's Satin Silk Blouse is fantastic! It fits perfectly, feels great to wear, and I get compliments every time I have it on. A must-have for work or casual outings!
Perfect fit. I have it ready for any occasion. I can dress it up with jewelry or just wear it alone

I recently added a black satin long sleeve shirt to my wardrobe, and it has quickly become one of my go-to pieces for both day and night wear. The shirt boasts a sleek and elegant design that exudes sophistication, making it a versatile choice for a variety of occasions. The satin material gives it a luxurious feel and a subtle sheen that catches the eye, enhancing the overall appeal of the garment.During the day, this shirt pairs beautifully with jeans or casual trousers for a chic, effortless look. Transitioning to evening wear is a breeze; it looks fantastic with dressier pants or skirts, making it perfect for dinners out or more formal events. The long sleeves add a touch of class and are ideal for cooler evenings, providing both style and comfort.The reason I'm giving this shirt a 4-star review, despite its versatility and style, is that it requires a bit of extra care to maintain its appearance. The satin material can be prone to wrinkling and needs to be handled gently, especially when washing and ironing. This isn't a major drawback, but it's something to consider if you're looking for low-maintenance clothing.Overall, I'm very pleased with this purchase. It's a beautiful, high-quality shirt that elevates any outfit, whether you're aiming for a casual daytime look or something more elegant for the evening. With the right care, it's a piece that can last and remain a staple in your wardrobe for a long time.

评论概述: Compliments every time I wear this
评论详情: Very nice shirt but funny story: I was wearing this shirt for my presentation at a conference. I picked up my name badge went to put it on when I realized it attached via safety pin. I stopped with this shirt in one hand and the pin in the other the moment I realized that this pin will leave a permanent hole in a shirt with this type of satin fabric. I took a moment to contemplate what to do and impulsively thought, “screw it, it’s just a shirt” and went to pin on the name tag. My boss bent closer to me and said, “Don’t do it” right before I made the poke. He was watching this dilemma the whole time and I’m so glad he stopped me. The name tag was not worth the shirt. I get so many compliments on it every time I wear it. 5 stars.

评论概述: Almost perfect-but that 1 thing is big
评论详情: This shirt is a gorgeous color and I love the way the collar sits, the cuff details, the thickness, and the sizing is correct. BUT there’s a huge front seam all the way down the middle of the shirt. At first I thought it was snagged. I’m told it’s “the style” so I kept it. But I don’t care for it
Beautiful color and material but the neck was a bit loose floppy 😊
Ordered my normal size and it hangs on me. Still kind of pretty. I’m on the fence about it. Weird seam down the middle that’s not exactly straight
Would not recommend this blouse, I should have sent it back.  The material is not good quality and the sleeves are very long.

Gorgeous color blouse in green!! The emerald jewel tone is so complimentary on any skin tone. Got so many compliments wearing it. One star off because of the seam going down the middle is annoying to look at. It almost makes it look cheap but the quality of the fabric is nice especially when the blouse is ironed. My steamer was struggling a tad but some ironing really did the trick.

The shirt itself is of nice material.  I gave it 3 stars because the size chart is about two sizes off the mark and that could be frustrating for someone who needs the shirt in a timely manner and has no time for returns.  My medium was way too big for me.  So I sent the medium back and I got a size small. The size small was still slightly large for me, but because I did not want to go through the return process again I settled for the small, but I probably should be wearing an extra small for it to be more of a tailored look.

Woah! I’m not sure if this will always be the case but this shirt has a crazy static problem! I tried it on at two different times and each time it was an issue. I was concerned it would always be an issue. Bummer because it fit my 5’6”, 135#, 32DD frame nicely.

I love this top! The fabric is silky and beautiful and does not wrinkle. I can wear this to work and look professional, plus the shade of blue is perfect! It is a little thicker than I was expecting but not overly so and makes you warm. So glad I purchased this top!
Great pairing ability with slacks or skirt or shorts. Love it!
Everything was great. Good fabric, fit, color true to advertisement. I love it.

I ordered the apricot which I think is a classic cream. It’s a great color. Nice blouse but it is a close fit. I usually wear medium(8-10) or a 10 in tops I am a 36DD.  This medium fits very comfortably over my bust, a bit tight below my bra in the back, but lays nicely around the bottom of the back, and throughout the front.  I would order the large but the sizing would would be a sloppy fit (2-4 inches larger in the bust!).  However, I will keep it.  There is bit of stretch so I will run an iron over it, to stretch it out a bit.  If that works, I will definitely order more colors.
Great material thickness, it feels like expensive material, fits great, washes well, and didn’t wrinkle on me throughout the day.
I get so many compliments when I wear the green. I like so much that I bought another one in pink.
The color is very pretty.  The quality appears to be very good.  The price was right!  Very pleased with this purchase.

I purchased this peacock blue blouse in a size large.The material was soft and satiny but not too sheer or flimsy. It arrived in a tiny plastic bag. The wrinkles were so bad that it took me 20 minutes to remove them with a steamer. The left cuff was stitched perfectly, however, there are stitches that are unfinished on the right cuff. Also the stitching down the center of the blouse was too tight which caused the fabric to bunch up instead of laying flat. I couldn’t steam or iron this out. I’m wearing the blouse under a tan suit so I will keep it but now I’m hesitant to purchase this product again because of the flaws.

The fabric is rich, with a nice sheen. Not too thin. The color is perfection. I love this brand but the fit is hit or miss.  Sleeves are a little long but it skims over my hips perfectly.  Overall, keeper.
I like the large collar and looks great under blazers! The white is a tad see-through but still a good blouse for office. Pairs nicely under vests and blazers.

It looks as good with jeans as it does with a suit. The fit is superb because it doesn't button down the front. If you are a bit busty and have always been troubled with gaps where you don't want them, you'll be glad to know this pullover gives you the smooth and classical look you've always wanted. I love the fabric, which feels luxe and doesn't wrinkle from being worn all day at the office.
